segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console

segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console

segment.source: You can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to configure the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).
segment.target: You can use the Application Virtualization Client Management Console to configure the Application Virtualization Desktop Client and the Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).

segment.source: How to Change the Cache Size and the Drive Letter Designation
segment.target: How to Change the Cache Size and the Drive Letter Designation

segment.source: Provides procedures you can use to change the cache size and the drive designation letter that represents the virtual drive.
segment.target: Provides procedures you can use to change the cache size and the drive designation letter that represents the virtual drive.

segment.source: How to Change the Log Reporting Levels and Reset the Log Files
segment.target: How to Change the Log Reporting Levels and Reset the Log Files

segment.source: Provides procedures you can use to change the log reporting levels and to reset the log files.
segment.target: Provides procedures you can use to change the log reporting levels and to reset the log files.

segment.source: How to Change User Access Permissions
segment.target: How to Change User Access Permissions

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to change the user access permissions.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to change the user access permissions.

segment.source: How to Change Import Search Paths
segment.target: How to Change Import Search Paths

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to set up client import search paths.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to set up client import search paths.

segment.source: How to Set Up Periodic Publishing Refresh
segment.target: How to Set Up Periodic Publishing Refresh

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to establish a schedule for Application Virtualization Server refresh.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to establish a schedule for Application Virtualization Server refresh.

segment.source: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login
segment.target: How to Set Up Publishing Refresh on Login

segment.source: Provides a procedure you can use to force Application Virtualization Server refresh on system login.
segment.target: Provides a procedure you can use to force Application Virtualization Server refresh on system login.
